P

Parser - Class in command_pattern
This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application.
Parser(Room, PlayerItems) - Constructor for class command_pattern.Parser
Create a parser to read from the terminal window.
play() - Method in class main.Game
Main play routine.
Player - Class in command_pattern
A receiver of the command pattern and a controller of the MVC design All player actions are set here The controller links to the printer, which is the view part of the MVC
Player(Room, PlayerItems) - Constructor for class command_pattern.Player
 
PlayerAction - Interface in command_pattern
The client An interface that creates all Receivers
PlayerDrops - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to drop an item
PlayerDrops(PlayerAction) - Constructor for class command_pattern.PlayerDrops
 
PlayerGives - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to give an item to another player
PlayerGives(PlayerAction) - Constructor for class command_pattern.PlayerGives
 
PlayerGoes - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to go in a direction, normally through an exit
PlayerGoes(PlayerAction) - Constructor for class command_pattern.PlayerGoes
 
PlayerHelp - Class in command_pattern
The player needs some helpful guidance
PlayerHelp(PlayerAction) - Constructor for class command_pattern.PlayerHelp
 
PlayerItems - Class in contents_items
The items that the player holds
PlayerItems(String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class contents_items.PlayerItems
Constructor for the items a player has
PlayerLooks - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to inspect the room

PlayerQuits - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to quit

PlayerTakes - Class in command_pattern
The player wants to take an item from the room

Print - Class in command_pattern
Print Class containing all print methods
Print() - Constructor for class command_pattern.Print
 
print(String) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Simple print method, allowing classes to input a built string Normal escape sequences accepted Can be for proper nouns, which won't get translated
printErr(String) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print out relevant error messages
printHelp() - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print out some help information.
printItems(Room) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print the room's items.
println(String) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Prints a line of keys after converting to its value
printLocation(Room) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print user guidance for the player's location
printLook(Room) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print a sequence of print literal strings
printPlayers(Room) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Get and print the names and items for all players in the room Development: need to get the array list of the player items from the Player class
printWelcome(Room) - Method in class command_pattern.Print
Print out the opening message for the player.
